job_description: software engineering job for the role Entry Level AI Performance Analyst

• Snr / Principal Engineer, HIG-HBM Product Engineering (Media Health Reliability Coding)Singapore, SingaporePosted 22 days ago Senior/Principal Engineer, HIG-HBM Product Engineering (Media Health Reliability)Singapore, SingaporePosted 4 months ago Minimum standing in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Business, or a related field required.
• Collaborate with customer engineering teams to understand requirements and deliver solutions.
• Strong oral and written communication skills for technical and non-technical audiences.
• Experience or coursework in AI/ML, including model development and deployment.
• Previous internship or project experience in semiconductor or memory systems.
• Experience with Python, C++, or C for data analysis and automation.
• Familiarity with product validation workflows and performance benchmarking.
• Familiarity with digital circuit concepts and CMOS transistor operation.

• Skilled in electrical, vacuum, gas flow and mechanical fundamentals including experience at using schematic diagrams to fix systems to components level Must be flexible to work any shift and rotate shifts as needed (allowing for flexibility around school schedule where applicable) Knowledge of AC/DC circuits, including fundamentals of electricity, and basic electronic components and circuits Bachelor’s degree in electrical engineering or mechanical Engineer.
• Intermediate to advanced software skills, i.
• Python, Java, Tableau, Matlab, MS Office Suite A strong mechanical aptitude with the ability to understand and solve mechanical issues Strong time management, organization, prioritization and communication skills Ability to learn area equipment including knowledge of the process Excellent verbal and written communication skills Ability to work in a cleanroom environment.
• Other related fields may be considered.
